pages.text: 83|35|Susajjita asanata bahi sihamte ca'i thakiba.
83|36|Kaphirasakale sihamtara krtakarmara phala palene
84|1|yetiya akasa bidirna ha’ba
84|2|arau tara pratipalakara adesa palana karaiba arau e'itorae tara karaniya.
84|3|Arau yetiya prthiraika samprasaraita karaa ha’ba.
84|4|Arau prthiraiye tara bhitarata thaka sakalobora bahiralai niksepa karaiba arau i garbhasun'ya hai paraiba.
84|5|Arau tara pratipalakara adesa palana karaiba arau e'itorae tara karaniya.
84|6|He manara! Tumi tomara pratipalakara naikatya pabalai kathora paraisrama karaiba lagiba, tetiyahe te'omra saksata labha karaiba paraiba.
84|7|Eteke yara amalanama tara som hatata diya haba
84|8|atyanta sahaja bharae tara hicapa-nikaca loraa ha’ba.
84|9|Arau si tara aponajanara ocaralai praphullacitte ubhati yaba
84|10|arau yara amalanama pichaphalara paraa diya ha’ba
84|11|si nijara dhbansa ahbana karaiba
84|12|arau si jbalanta ju'ita praraesa karaiba
84|13|niscaya si nija paraiyalara majata anandata achila
84|14|niscaya si bhabichila ye, si ketiya'o ubhati nayaba
84|15|haya, niscaya tara pratipalaka tara oparata samyaka drsti danakarai.
84|16|Eteke ma'i sapata karaicho pascima akasara rana kiranara
84|17|raatira sapata arau i yiborara samabesa ghataya
84|18|arau candrara sapata, yetiya i purnata labha karae
84|19|arasya'i tomaloke eta starara paraa ana eta staralai araohana karaiba.
84|20|Kintu sihamtara ki ha’la, sihamte imana posana nakarae kiya
84|21|arau yetiya sihamtara ocarata kora'ana tilaraata karaa haya tetiya sihamte chajada nakarae kiya
84|22|baram kaphirasakale asbikara karae.
84|23|Arau sihamte (antarata) yi posana karae allahe se'i bisaye sabisesa aragata.
84|24|Seye tumi sihamtaka yantranadayaka sastira sambada diya
84|25|kintu yisakale imana ane arau satkarma karae te'omlokara babe ache nirabicchinna pratidana.
